title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Beat eggs and mix with Parmesan.
Combine spaghetti, pancetta, and egg mixture.
Serve with extra Parmesan and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a creamy tomato gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for 1 hour.
Cook onions and tomatoes in a pan.
Add grilled chicken and cream to the pan.
